name: Reformat phone number
instruction:
A string containing a phone number is passed to the `formatPhoneNumber` function.

The incoming string will always be of the form `+XXXXXXXXXXX`, where `X` is a digit.
It is necessary to reformat the phone number into the format `+1 (XXX) XXX-XXXX`, where `X` is a digit.

Examples of how to run the function:
```javascript
formatPhoneNumber('+17071234567'); // '+1 (707) 123-4567'
formatPhoneNumber('+24151234567'); // '+2 (415) 123-4567'
formatPhoneNumber('+36501234567'); // '+3 (650) 123-4567'
```

Use string concatenation and refer to each character in the string by index.
